args: Debug: right-click the block at 512000,3,512000 (it will go on cooldown for 1 in-game hour).

actionObjectives.onCompleteActions: notify 'CooldownBlock: applying 1 in-game hour cooldown to block (512000,3,512000)'; cooldownblock 1 512000,3,512000; notify 'Done. Completing quest.'; completequest
